label: Leadership
desc: Leads team and decision making under pressure.

label: Technical
desc: Mechanical understanding and car development input.

label: Communication
desc: Clarity in transmitting instructions to drivers and crew during GPs.

label: Pit Stop Mgmt
desc: Coordination and training of mechanics, reducing pit stop errors.

label: Reliability Focus
desc: Attention to detail preventing failures and breakdowns.

label: Data Analysis
desc: Ability to interpret telemetry and car data for performance gains.

label: Innovation
desc: Creativity in solutions, driving unique upgrades and developments.

label: Budget Mgmt
desc: Efficiency in handling financial resources and investments.

label: Driver Dev.
desc: Focus on coaching and improving young or academy drivers.

label: Conflict Mgmt
desc: Managing egos and disputes, maintaining team harmony.

label: Negotiation
desc: Skills in negotiating contracts, sponsors, and supplier deals.
